website_summaries.verdict: This compact, folding hair dryer is perfect for travel, yet it works well as a full-size dryer.
pros: Despite being small and quiet, this dryer is powerful
The ergonomic design feels good in the hand
cons: The highest setting doesn't seem powerful enough, and it can pull your hair into the motor if it gets too close

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 5 Months
customer_reviews.text: This poor rating is reflective of Conair's return policy and not Amazon. Since the item stopped working after a few months, I contacted Conair directly because it was beyond Amazon's standard return period. It was covered by warranty BUT user needs to pay shipping and handling to return the item to manufacturer as well as return shipping to get the replacement. This turns out to be MORE than the item is worth! I will be shopping for another hair dryer -- probably at a standard brick and mortar store (in case of any future return problems) but one thing is certain -- it won't be a Conair product.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great for international travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great Travel dryer. With the dual wattage dial it was easy to switch to the 240 European wattage and using a plug adapter worked great on a trip to Ireland. It is small but did a great job on the low setting (only low used with the 240 wattage). I am home and have switched it back to 110 wattage and can use here. Hair dryers were not available at all hotels/B&B's we stayed at; would definitely recommend taking a dryer on any trips outside the US.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: this is the worst hair dryer I've ever had in my life
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this is the worst hair dryer I've ever had in my life! It should come with a warning... I bought it in November, it's now February and it doesn't work. As a matter of fact it is a safety hazard! High sounded like low and low was nonexistent. I have fine thin hair and don't need much so I thought what the heck; I'm not over drying my hair. That burning wire smell increased the more I used it and I only use it once or twice a week. Seriously, the last time I plugged it in to use it, and looked in the front, there was flame!!! Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: carla cooper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this same brand and type of hair dryer for longer than most of you have been alive. They are light weight, compact, fold for travel, and have a cooling button that makes a huge difference in comfort for tender scalps. They really do last forever, don't break when dropped (often), hang easily from a cup hook, bathroom moisture doesn't seem to affect them, and the only reason I ordered this is because a big cricket stealthily got into my old one during the night and I crispy fried him. Sadly it was a smell that will never go away.... Thank you Conair and please don't ever stop making these.
customer_reviews.author: Bakersfield Grandma

customer_reviews.title: This left my hair feeling pretty crispy compared to my T3 but it's really not ...
customer_reviews.text: This left my hair feeling pretty crispy compared to my T3 but it's really not fair to expect a cheap travel dryer to perform like a fancy dryer. It worked for what I needed it for: dry my hair and take up minimal space in a carry on. If I were going on a trip and needed my hair to look good however, I would bring my T3. This isn't a styling dryer, it either blows like a hot hurricane or barely rustles a strand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooling off I guess
customer_reviews.text: I hate this dryer and will be getting a different one soon. It is a replacement for a Conair 1875 that smoked out after many great years of use. This new one blows out air that is hardly hotter than room temperature. I use high with short hair and like to be done quickly. Not happenin’ with this dryer. And it's a good thing I don't want any cooler air because the "cool" button is one you have to hold in constantly. Update: I ordered this Remington dryer instead:  It is SO MUCH better than this Conair. Remington has a hot setting that works, actually multiple heat and fan settings. Get it instead of the Conair.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous wiring! Broke after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: I used this about once or twice a day for a year and it was fine until it suddenly stopped working. When I opened up the handle, I noticed that one of the wires had been sliced completely through from a plastic edge when it's folded up. One year of use isn't so bad I guess, but what scared me was that ALL of the wires in the handle were similarly exposed and partly cut. If they had happened to touch, probably it would have caught on fire. I would avoid this product or at the very least, don't fold and unfold it every day.
customer_reviews.author: David Wetterau

customer_reviews.title: Everything was fine until I suck my hair and gets tangled with ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine until I suck my hair and gets tangled with the blades and I had to cut my hair to be able to release it from the dryer with one hand holding my hair and another trying to disconnect the dryer I finish without hair in a section of my skull and pain in my scalp I don't feel safe to use it again the dryer , I don't recommend I buy this brand because I thought it was a good brand..
customer_reviews.author: Laura Castillejo

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find something small, lightweight and quiet for drying off my yorkie pup after giving her a bath. I haen't used it on her yet, just tested it on myself and it seems good. Though it can get pretty hot, which is disappointing to say the least. There is a cool button but you have to keep it pressed (maybe I'll just tape it) to cool it down. I wanted to find someone that would help me dry her off quickly so she wouldn't get cold, but was not hot enough to burn her. This is too hot. So I'll have to cycle between the heat and cool when it gets too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: an effective product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high quality hair dryer, but it gets the job done. It's very small and definitely powerful for its size. It will get your hair dry in 10 minutes. It's not great for styling, or anything really besides just getting your hair dry. I bring it to the gym in the morning, and it's nice to store under the sink in my tiny apartment. Overall, if you're just looking for something to dry your hair efficiently and affordably, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: rv1

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer to keep on our boat - because of its compact size with high wattage. The first time I used it, it snatched some of my hair and wouldn’t let go. In a panic I got it unplugged and had to break off my hair (no one around to help). I’ve been using blow dryers for decades (literally) and have never had this happen before. Later I tried to turn it on out of curiosity, but it was ruined. I threw it away in the Anacortes Marinas shower room. Planning to schlep my trustworthy hairdryer from home next time.
customer_reviews.author: bjh

customer_reviews.title: same model to replace my 20 yr old purple 1875
customer_reviews.text: This is the same model 1875 as the old purple one I've had for 20 years! BTW, the old one still works, just the cooling button pushed in about 10 yrs ago. Only issue is that the cord is shorter than the old one, not by much, maybe 6".
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice travel dryer! I bought this for traveling with so I don’t have to worry about losing or getting my nice one damaged very light weight and simple. When you first get it and turn it on the first few times it may have a plastic or burnt smell but it’s probably just residue from the factory. I would recommend it if you travel often or full time, not the best one in the world but it gets the job done 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: it was almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: great small hair dryer that folds easily, good amount of drying power for wet hair with cooling feature. works fine, but it came damaged, a crack was noted by the button on the dryer. pro: good for travel enough power for short hair, probably need a stronger one for longer hair cord is sturdy and durable cons : dont use for long periods of time it overheats the folding mechanism will get worned out later on easy to crack the outer plastic
customer_reviews.author: Joon yi

customer_reviews.title: Decent Little Travel Blower.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travel, have had it for about six months. I like to wait a bit before reviewing things like this to make sure they don't die on the vine quickly. I bought this little guy specifically for travel and it hasn't let me down. It's not a power dynamo, most of these smaller blowers aren't, but this one will do the job if you have hair that is mostly willing to do what you want it to do. But if you need a tornado blowing at your hair, this blower probably wouldn't be The One for you.. For me, it's just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with and works so well!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy! It hardly took any room up in my suitcase and it worked so well! If you're traveling and don't want to use the hairdryers the hotels provide (which probably haven't been cleaned since the place opened), then buy this hair dryer. You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Hildie

customer_reviews.title: I like that it folds up for storing in my drawer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hairdryer of this kind I’ve purchased. (The first one’s handle broke after years of use). I like it because it folds up in my drawer. It’s really a bit large for travel and I never travel with a hairdryer nowadays anyway. It has a slow and fast speed as well as a cool shot button. I only really use the fast speed. It dries my short fine hair in a few minutes. It’s not too heavy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LWEW

customer_reviews.title: Works well but desperately needs a diffuser option
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered from amazon never arrived, but I ended up purchasing it locally. It’s a nice little dryer, enough power to handle my long 3a curls without taking forever, and without burning them. It desperately needs a diffuser, however, and I haven’t been able to find one that works with it because the end of the dryer is tapered significantly- as if it was specifically designed to prevent a diffuser from being used! Super frustrating because otherwise this would’ve been my go-to dryer for days when I can’t air dry.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this hairdryer three times I loved it so much. It's compact and powerful; however, while the first two lasted fir several years, this one lasted 2 months and 2 days. Of course it's just outside of the return window and I didn't keep the packaging. I can't attest to international travel though since I never used it outside of the US. I'm disappointed and will try a different hairdryer now.
customer_reviews.author: Septer

customer_reviews.title: quiet but not super powerful or hot
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little hair dryer for travel. It folds up small and it has a low and high setting. for 1875 watts it seems a little on the "weak" side - not super powerful blowing. It also does not get very hot. If I had long hair I'm not sure I'd get this hair dryer because I think it would take a long time to get it dry. I have short hair so it is sufficient. It seems to be quieter than the hair dryer that I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Compact Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer replaced a full size 1875 watt hairdryer that gave out. If you have ever wished for a hairdryer with a medium heat and blow setting, this one is for you! Exactly what I like! The compact design is perfect. The low setting is very low and the high setting does not blow as hard as the big hairdryers. But enough to dry and style with control. Definitely warm enough, but not hot.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, but it works for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Very light and great to travel with. I use it for when I want to workout during the day and need to straighten out my hair. You can tell it's cheap, but if you expect to do a salon styling with this thing, you're expectations are too high. Recommend for busy on the go people.
customer_reviews.author: lawsome2011

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've tried using my dryer a few times and it's just not powerful enough. I have pretty thick hair, but after reading other reviews I was hopeful that this little guy would get the job done, but it takes like 20-30 minutes. I just don't have that kind of time. I will be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Noise! Useless. Waste of time and effort.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a horrible loud noise, like metal hitting something, and it has a weird vibration when handled... Very difficult to handle and to use. Did I get a broken unit? Don't know and it is way easier to leave a bad review than to put more effort into this. I regret this purchase and you might regret purchasing this too. Getting products delivered should help to make ones life easier, not to have to spend too much time and effort into it.
customer_reviews.author: δ

customer_reviews.title: Conair 1875 Watt Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: The Conair 1875 watt hairdryer is really a great little dryer, my 2 daughters and I all have long thick hair and this dryer works very well for us. I expected it not to have much power but I ordered it when the dryer we had been using stopped working, it was to be a standby until I could find something that would work fast, with lots of power. I am thrilled that I did not have to search any further, this dryer is perfect it is compact, powerful and quiet (for a hair dryer). I am thinking of ordering a second one for the kids and keeping this one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: donna d

customer_reviews.title: hot air feels soft and diffused = nice, doesn't hit hard
customer_reviews.text: I've always purchased cheap blow dryers and the only thing I ever wanted was hot air and something small I can pack easily. This dryer folds but it's not as small as others that fold. The air doesn't hit you hard; it actually feels like soft air (if that makes any sense) and it's not noisy at all. It's as if there's a diffuser inside of it, making the air spread out. I love it and I'll never go back to the other types.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you like round nozzles
customer_reviews.text: For many years, I have been using hair dryers with the long rectangular vent. I bought this one to replace my old one that gave up the ghost. It works fine, powerful and all, but I just couldn't get used to the round nozzle. I gave it to my wife and she likes it for her travel dryer. Good features, good buy if you like round nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: All 3 of these I have purchased have been great
customer_reviews.text: I have a medical condition that makes it hard to have my hands over my head. This blow dryer is light enough I can use it with ease and powerful enough to dry long hair (almost to the middle of my back). This is the third time I have purchased this model and each one has lasted multiple years with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: TN Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gym Bags and Travel
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of throwing my full-sized blow dryer in my gym bag and luggage. For my on-the-go needs, I decided I needed a smaller, compact dryer. This little blow dryer packs quite a punch. While it does not come with the attachments a full dryer does, such as the narrow flat piece or curl dryer, it gets the job done and does it well. Easy to tote around, this is ideal for any girl on the run.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for our trip to Italy and cruise to the Greek Isles. No problem using it with a European adapter plug at the higher voltage setting. I recommend it if you are looking to save space in your suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DIY

customer_reviews.title: Delivers within expectations
customer_reviews.text: From the perspective that it’s a travel blow dryer, and it was less than $20, it’s pretty reasonable. Is it the best ever? No. Is it the worst ever? Also no. It simply delivers what it promises at a reasonable price point. It’s light enough that my 3 year old can use it by herself (with supervision of course.)
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sucks my long hair into the motor
customer_reviews.text: Blow dryer is just okay does not blow very hard takes longer to dry my hair. Also the cover on the back does not keep things out of it my hair is long and it sucks my hair into the fan if I am not careful to get it to close I have never had a blow-dryer do this before I would not recommend or purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: First used one of these hair dryers in a Westin hotel. Bought one shortly after and used it for many years until I dropped it accidentally. This was a replacement and is just as good as my first one. Don’t be fooled by the small size, it’s a powerful dryer. Also like the folding feature for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to get this hairdryer to try out. I need this for a trip coming up. It is small and lightweight but it is powerful. Reason for 4 stars: I think I have received a used item since the box looked like it had been opened. Also, the dryer was dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Anil

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to use. Smaller size doesn't decrease the power of this hairdryer. The cord could be long for bathrooms where the mirror is about 3 feet from the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco Princess

customer_reviews.title: No removable air vent as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today and am disappointed. The main reason I bought this particular dryer was because one of the pictures showed that the air vent was removable making it easier to clean (which would help keep it from overheating). The one I received today (Model 124TLR) does not have the removable vent as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than past versions of a compact hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I passed on other models that would wind up the cord internally, assuming I'd get a hair dryer about the same size as the last one I purchased from Conair. It's bigger. At least the handle folds which I chose. But the barrel is bigger and bulkier for a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pope

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer for my teenage grandson. He really loves it. But if you're older beware it's a little heavier than most dryers this size. Probably because of its big 1875 capacity motor which does help it dry faster
customer_reviews.author: Pem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home and travel
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is small and powerful and has a cold-shot. Works great in Europe. Just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job Without the Weight
customer_reviews.text: It's so lightweight and doesn't take up too much space. It gets the job done too. Plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Great general use dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is about the 6th one of these dryers I have bought over the years for my wife. They last a long time, but she keeps finding places where having one would be handy.......master bath, guest bath, Motorhome, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo

customer_reviews.title: The cool shot button was on the back as well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Item sent to me did not match the description. Was looking to replace my old dryer which was the same 1875 Watt model and this one barely had any power compared to the last one. The cool shot button was on the back as well and the air intake looks totally different. Unfortunately I already used it and wont return a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer, but maybe just not this one
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this dryer before and love it. I have one that I keep in my luggage just for travel, and one that I use every day (which just died after 2 years). This purchase, to replace the one that died, keeps tripping the circuit breaker. I'm returning for another one, will update as to whether I believe I just got a lemon, or if the quality of these has slipped.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great budget hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: got this for my boyfriend, he just needs something practical for daily use. I have used it a few times in a pinch, and it's actually worked for my super thick hair as well. Great value for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great little hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is the best! For a small package it packs a punch. The one I had for years finally bit the dust so I was thrilled to be able to replace it with the same one. This one is even more quiet than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ibistech

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for christmas and she uses it every single day. It has great drying power, but it is also compact and small so it can fit in a drawer easily. Great quality and color! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: motley

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact dryer to take to the gym. Very nice and very easy to pack into a gym bag. Does have the power to get my hair dry fast so I can be out the door and get to work. Has a really nice teal color. Product just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel - very powerful for its size
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the power of this smaller hair dryer - very impressive! It's a bit heavy - which is likely responsible for its robust airflow. All-in-all very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold setting doesn’t do anything. Blow dryer too low powered for this.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. The cold setting does absolutely nothing though. I bought this just to blow out my bangs with a round brush and give them a nice shape, so that’s really saying a lot as I have very thin hair. I dont blow dry my hair anymore I let it dry naturally so the fact I have to use hott every time might actually be damaging my hair line/bangs and making them even thinner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much quieter
customer_reviews.text: I had a Conair travel dryer for years and loved it. When it finally died I tried another brand but it had such a high pitched loud motor it hurt my ears. So glad to find this one. It replaces the old Conair exactly. Quiet and plenty of power. Hope it lasts as long as the old one!
customer_reviews.author: R. May

customer_reviews.title: Its like a little portable motel hair dryer replacement
customer_reviews.text: Ahh, it's just ok to take with you and travel. It arrived in one piece, undamaged with Prime - check. Tested it with the family after their showers. All expressed the opinion that the fan setting under "High" really means low based on the older models around the house. The fan under the high setting barely produces a wind that blows into your face. Its like a little portable motel hair dryer replacement. I will begin the search again to find a wind machine hair dryer that can ruffle your hair at 3 feet.
customer_reviews.author: ellene meece

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: this dryer, I thought at first, was the best, then over the weeks everytime I dried my longish hair it sucked it in and pulled it out and the hair went into the motor and helped it die, plus it smelled like burning hair, horrific.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Features Were A Little Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I may have misunderstood, but I thought there was a high/low heat setting, and there is to some degree, but only if you also want a faster fan speed. It's either low speed/low temp. or high speed/high temp. I was hoping for a low speed/high temp setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cool air button caved in
customer_reviews.text: I have the exact same model, bought 5 years ago. The cool air button caved in, so I ordered this as areplacement. . This one doesn't get as hot, but still dries hair fast.
customer_reviews.author: Koza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watt, weight, and size !
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with consir. Very light ans small for storage but still has a powerful punch! My old one cost 3 times more andbi can hardly lift it these days! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this dryer, she has hand numbness and she has no problems handling this dryer and using the controls. I recommend this dryer, great price, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: You will be surprised how great this time is!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful for its size, practical for travels. In short words - simply awesome! It was delivered promptly, in a nice box. A handle can be folded. I realized that this little drier works better than my old full size Conair.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Dangerous. Hair was sucked into rear of dryer,had to cut it off. Burned hand on front opening.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette england

customer_reviews.title: Small and quiet
customer_reviews.text: The folded small size is great for packing for a trip. It’s pretty quiet- not as loud as my last dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little yet powerful hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little yet powerful hair dryer. I went to Mexico in December 2014 and did not have this yet. The one supplied by the resort was SO SLOW! It took forever to dry my hair and did not do a great job...so I bought this when I knew I'd be away for 2 weeks in February and was very pleased. It's very light, easy to handle and very powerful. It dried my hair in no time and is a cinch to pack, as it is small and has a folding handle. Shipment was fast and efficient. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Charles

customer_reviews.title: works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer does not get very hot. I use it to dry and shape my beard as it is getting longer, but I don't feel it gets hot enough to style hair.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and it works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over four years ago and it still works great. I do not low dry my hair daily or anything but I still think that it has a pretty impressive life for a travel size tool at this price. I recently acquired a chi blow dryer and it definitely has more drying power but I honestly still use this one. I just love how easily it fits in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Good but not like the original
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well, but not as good as an older version of this I had from years ago. As the saying goes... they don’t make them like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Armeen Mazda

customer_reviews.title: Great Price And it Works
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a longer cord but it still works great. I love the way it folds up so compactly and it fits easily into a drawer with my hair brushes and combs.
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer -- excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little hair dryer. Great power on high and low, and love the cool shot button. I always cool down hair after dry. Compact size with folding handle, and cord is substantial and will hold up to winding around body of dryer after use. ConAir is a good name and I anticipate long time use.
customer_reviews.author: Lesuse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hair dryer I will purchase for traveling. It is extremely durable and folds up to a compact size to fit easily in bags or suitcases. I don't leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: PuyallupPaddler

customer_reviews.title: "THE HEAT IS OUT THE BAG"
customer_reviews.text: i use this product on my legs. have very bad leg cramps.this products works wonder for me. i hold over my legs until they stop.gives great heat.it folds so i can take it with me in the bag.it is great for your hair to.
customer_reviews.author: wanda griffith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fin and would get sucked into the air intake. Needs a filter screen.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good At Generating Heat
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a portable source of heat to dry things that got wet during an art project. (I'm a bald male, so its intended purpose is useless to me). I was pretty satisfied with how hot it got.
customer_reviews.author: Lightness1852

customer_reviews.title: stop working
customer_reviews.text: It stop working. I am using it 2 minutes per day didn't last a month. I use it just for my beard. Never used more than 2 minutes. Please let me know how can I do to return it and get another one. thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great little powerful dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little dryer. Bought it for my gym bag. I have a much older version that I keep at work (20 years old). Lasts forever, folds up nicely, has enough power to dry hair quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Anneke Van Den Broek

customer_reviews.title: A Lemon!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and it popped and since hasn't worked -- since I was out of town (bought it specifically since I was traveling), I didn't get home in time to return it. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High speed doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: High setting does not work. It either runs for a few seconds, and then shuts off, or doesn't start at all. I have tried resetting the circuit breaker, but it doesn't help. Yes, I am running at the 115 setting.
customer_reviews.author: A. Loftenn

customer_reviews.title: A faulty product
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for three months . Then it started to blow with less force on high. After another month it started smoking one day and i immediately turned it off because i was afraid it catching on fire. I will never order Conair dryer again!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: only has two speeds- strong speed great for start up with my short hair and I like the very low speed- to do the 'final' drying- I love that it folds up- would like it if there was a better way to fold the cord- a retractable cord would be fantastic- I really hate a cord that is all twisted
customer_reviews.author: Deanna King

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Dryer was plugged into a GFI outlet and immediately sparked at the cord and inside the dryer itself. Low speed doesn't work and high speed flickers. This item is extremely dangerous. It is a safety hazard and should not be allowed to be sold. Avoid this at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Luke W Fry

customer_reviews.title: Adequate hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: The air doesn't get very warm so it takes a little longer to dry but its probably better for my hair. It's not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best small high output dryer
customer_reviews.text: As a designer I am doing paint color and finish samples for clients all day long and this little gem fits in my toolbox and has lasted years before being lost or stolen. It has a cool button for fluctuating the heat that you simply press with your thumb on and off while using. For the price theres nothing out there comparable in design or quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Design

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works well. Lasts long. Good for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tried and true. Works well. Good for travel. Easy to hold, nice and lightweight, yet powerful enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Mae

customer_reviews.title: Fast dryer
customer_reviews.text: Dryer works like a champ and will make short work of wet hair. not too noisy and does not get super hot to the touch (plastic case around heating element. folding equals easy to store in smaller drawers
customer_reviews.author: R. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised at how much I like this little hairdryer. I’m super picky about hairdryers and the number of settings they have. Obviously I’m not going to get 10 combinations of settings here, but this one actually did the trick. For a travel size it’s a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value for $ was fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: great value for $ was fast delivery wish it was as small and lightweight was one I had to replace, larger and bulkier than I had hoped but for the $ great value the super small was double the price
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: The hairdryer gets nice and hot but the airflow on the high setting is not a strong as my old hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Quiet hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small, inexpensive hair dryer. This hair dryer works well, is compact and has a quiet motor. I don't feel as if I am in a wind tunnel when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my craft station. You can hold down the button for cool air. I wish it had a cold air olny setting though. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing because it had such great reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer stopped working after 1 week of use. I wish I could give it 0 stars. So disappointing because it had such great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the gym and I have to carry it in every day. The size and the foldability make it easy to carry and fit in my bag. Plenty of power to do the job after towel drying the hair. Would buy again but bet I won't have to.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: Heating element doesn’t work. It just blows cold air! Maybe try a little quality control at con air. Key word is con!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Tangled hair
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how it is even possible but every time I use this hairdryer my hair gets knotted into a massive knot. I ended up losing a large chunk of hair the last time I used it. I have never had this problem with any other hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product is made with quality. I have been using it for a year and a half daily after showering for my beard. Very light and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kane.B

customer_reviews.title: Good little hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hair dryer, but it appeared to be used. The box was definitely opened before and when I turned it on, there was a piece of hair blowing out of it. I didn't return it because I needed it for a trip I was taking the day after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: Small and convenient, the quality is average, the wind blowing out of it has a smell of gum, and I am a bit worried about it
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on Conair. The dryer this one replaced was over 30 years old, used daily without a whimper. The new one is slightly larger and heavier than the last one. Old one had a longer power cord, too.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Figgie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. I have a much older version of this model which is in another bathroom. This one is much quieter, but dries just as well. I love the lightweight compact size. I have long straight hair and it's dried within a few minutes. I just wish it wasn't the ugly color it is.
customer_reviews.author: Creaky

customer_reviews.title: Ok for travel but not as powerful as the previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok for travel but not as powerful as the previous non-folding Conair 1875 watt I own which I find odd; the same wattage should be the same output in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work in the UK
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this in while in England and it blew immediately. Now while in the UK I need to find a hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Carr

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need it do do.
customer_reviews.text: I like this compact Conair dryer. It works very well for my short hair and takes up little storage room. I generally am pleased with Conair products so I was comfortable ordering this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Graycee

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for about 10 years and used it every day. I loved it. This one works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Peggysgc

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for its size.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredibly compact, while still delivering a lot of heat and air. I can feel it from across my living room. The cord is very long which makes it super easy to use. Would definitely recommend this hair dryer to someone who is looking to own one simple hair dryer that will easily fit in a drawer or bag.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great travel blowdryer!
customer_reviews.text: After travelling every week to work and using crappy little hotel blowdryers I did my research and found this blowdry and its perfect for travel and still has enough power to feel like a legitimate blowdryer! Great price and great find!
customer_reviews.author: *Jewel*

product_meta.title: Conair 1875 Watt Compact Folding Handle Hair Dryer, Travel Hair Dryer
product_meta.description: The Conair 1875 Watt Compact Folding Handle Hair Dryer (also makes great Travel Hair Dryer) is conveniently transportable, compact and equipped with dual voltage for worldwide travel. Powerful enough to style hair on the go, this hair dryer features a full 1875 watts for fast drying. This styling tool has a folding handle that makes it easy to pack in a suitcase, or store in a drawer. Complete with 2 heat/speed settings to customize your hair drying experience, and 5 foot cord, it also has a cool shot button to lock in your finished style. Dual voltage lets you use this dryer at home and globally abroad.
feature_bullets: The Conair 1875 Watt Compact Folding Handle Dryer has a full 1875 watts of drying power
Folding handle for compact storage and travel
Cool shot button locks in style. ; Weight: 1.3 pounds

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
